trans-unit.source: Cypress automatically disables certain functionality in the Cypress launched browser that tend to get in the way of automated testing.

trans-unit.source: Cypress automatically includes jQuery and exposes it as Cypress.$.

trans-unit.source: Cypress automatically includes moment.js and exposes it as Cypress.moment.

trans-unit.source: Cypress automatically includes minimatch and exposes it as Cypress.minimatch.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯会自动包含minimatch并将其公开为 Cypress.minimatch 。

trans-unit.source: Cypress automatically includes Bluebird and exposes it as Cypress.Promise.

trans-unit.source: Cypress automatically includes lodash and exposes it as Cypress._. Call any valid Lodash method on Cypress._
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯会自动包含lodash并将其公开为 Cypress._ 。在 Cypress._ 上调用任何有效的Lodash方法。

trans-unit.source: Cypress automatically includes a Blob library and exposes it as Cypress.Blob.

trans-unit.source: Cypress automatically indicates when an XHR request happens in your application. These are always logged in the Command Log (regardless of whether it’s stubbed). Cypress indicates when a request has started and when it is finished. Additionally, Cypress takes a snapshot of the DOM at the moment the request is made and another snapshot at the moment the response returns.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯会自动指示您的应用程序中何时发生XHR请求。这些总是记录在命令日志中（无论是否存根）。赛普拉斯会指示请求何时开始以及何时完成。此外，赛普拉斯在发出请求时拍摄DOM快照，在响应返回时拍摄另一个快照。

trans-unit.source: Cypress automatically matches the spec and browser behavior for pressing the {enter} key when the input belongs to a <form>.
trans-unit.target: 当输入属于 <form> 时，Cypress会自动匹配规格和浏览器行为，以按 {enter} 键。

trans-unit.source: Cypress automatically normalizes the cy.location() command and strips out extraneous values and properties found in window.location. Also, the object literal yielded by cy.location() is just a basic object literal, not the special window.location object.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯会自动规范化 cy.location() 命令，并去除 window.location 中发现的无关紧要的值和属性。同样， cy.location() 产生的对象文字只是一个基本的对象文字，而不是特殊的 window.location 对象。

trans-unit.source: Cypress automatically prepends the http:// protocol to common hosts. If you’re not using one of these 3 hosts, then make sure to provide the protocol.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯会自动将 http:// 协议添加到通用主机。如果您未使用这三台主机之一，请确保提供协议。

trans-unit.source: Cypress automatically reads from your system’s HTTP_PROXY environment variable and uses that proxy for all HTTP and HTTPS traffic. If an HTTPS_PROXY environment variable is set, HTTPS traffic will use that proxy instead.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯会自动从系统的 HTTP_PROXY 环境变量读取数据，并将该代理用于所有HTTP和HTTPS通信。如果设置了 HTTPS_PROXY 环境变量，则HTTPS通信将改为使用该代理。

trans-unit.source: Cypress automatically retries cypress verify and cypress run commands by starting its own Xvfb server on Linux if the first attempt fails due to possible DISPLAY misconfiguration. Addresses #4034.
trans-unit.target: 如果第一次尝试由于可能的 DISPLAY 错误配置而失败，则 cypress run 通过在Linux上启动其自己的Xvfb服务器来自动重试 cypress verify 和cypress运行命令。地址＃4034。

trans-unit.source: Cypress automatically runs this command before each test to prevent state from being shared across tests. You shouldn’t need to use this command unless you’re using it to clear localStorage inside a single test.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯会在每次测试之前自动运行此命令，以防止在测试之间共享状态。除非在单个测试中使用它来清除localStorage，否则不需要使用此命令。

trans-unit.source: Cypress automatically scaffolds out a suggested folder structure for organizing your fixtures on every new project. By default it will create an example.json file when you add your project to Cypress.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯会自动创建建议的文件夹结构，以组织您在每个新项目上的灯具。默认情况下，当您将项目添加到赛普拉斯时，它将创建一个 example.json 文件。

trans-unit.source: Cypress automatically sets Content-Length and Content-Type based on the response body you stub.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯会根据您的响应 body 自动设置 Content-Length 和 Content-Type 。

trans-unit.source: Cypress automatically traveled back in time to a snapshot of when that command resolved. Additionally, since cy.contains() finds DOM elements on the page, Cypress also highlights the element and scrolls it into view (to the top of the page).
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯会自动返回到该命令解析时间的快照。另外，由于 cy.contains() 在页面上找到DOM元素，赛普拉斯还突出显示该元素并将其滚动到视图中（到页面顶部）。

trans-unit.source: Cypress automatically validates your fixtures. If your .json, .js, or .coffee files contain syntax errors, they will be shown in the Command Log.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯会自动验证您的灯具。如果您 .json ， .js 文件，或 .coffee 文件包含语法错误，他们将在命令日志中显示。

trans-unit.source: Cypress automatically waits for the network call to complete before proceeding to the next command.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯会自动等待网络呼叫完成后再进行下一个命令。

trans-unit.source: Cypress binaries can now be pointed to a staging environment with CYPRESS_ENV=staging. Fixes #813.
trans-unit.target: 现在可以使用 CYPRESS_ENV=staging 指向赛普拉斯二进制文件的登台环境。修复＃813。

trans-unit.source: Cypress blurs other focused elements first
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯先模糊其他重点元素

trans-unit.source: Cypress builds on these popular tools and frameworks that you hopefully already have some familiarity and knowledge of. If not, that’s okay too.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯以这些流行的工具和框架为基础，希望您已经对此有所了解和了解。如果没有，那也没关系。

trans-unit.source: Cypress bundles Chai, Chai-jQuery, and Sinon-Chai to provide built-in assertions. You can see a comprehensive list of them in the list of assertions reference. You can also write your own assertions as Chai plugins and use them in Cypress.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯将 Chai ， Chai-jQuery 和 Sinon-Chai 捆绑在一起以提供内置的断言。您可以在断言参考列表中看到它们的完整列表。您也可以将自己的断言编写为Chai插件，并在Cypress中使用它们。

trans-unit.source: Cypress bundles the popular Chai assertion library, as well as helpful extensions for Sinon and jQuery, bringing you dozens of powerful assertions for free.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯捆绑了流行的Chai断言库，以及针对Sinon和jQuery的有用扩展，为您免费提供了数十种强大的断言。

trans-unit.source: Cypress can alternatively be downloaded / installed / managed through the CLI utility.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯也可以通过CLI工具下载/安装/管理。

trans-unit.source: Cypress can now be run through the terminal.
trans-unit.target: 现在可以通过终端运行Cypress。

trans-unit.source: Cypress can now predict upcoming assertions and modifies its behavior until the intended state has been reached.
trans-unit.target: Cypress现在可以预测即将到来的断言,并修改其行为,直到达到预期状态。

trans-unit.source: Cypress can now run tests in parallel across multiple virtual machines, or can be parallelized on a single machine. Cypress will automatically figure out, detect, and load balance all of your specs in the fastest and most efficient way possible. There is no configuration other than passing a --parallel flag and spinning up multiple machines on your CI provider. From our experiments you can expect to see approximately 40% reduction in overall run time per machine you add. However, attempting to run in parallel on a single machine requires server grade hardware with dozens (or even hundreds) of CPU’s and GB of RAM to run efficiently. A much better and simpler approach is to use a cluster of docker containers that are all isolated from each other. Any standard CI service (CircleCI, TravisCI, etc) comes with the ability to do this. We automatically tap into their environment variables to make parallelization possible without you having to configure anything.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯现在可以在多个虚拟机上并行运行测试，或者可以在一台计算机上并行运行测试。赛普拉斯将以最快，最有效的方式自动找出，检测并均衡所有规格。除了传递 --parallel 标志并在CI提供程序上旋转多台计算机外，没有其他配置。从我们的实验中，您可以期望每台机器的总体运行时间减少约40％您添加。但是，尝试在单台计算机上并行运行需要服务器级硬件，数十个（甚至数百个）CPU和GB RAM才能有效运行。一种更好，更简单的方法是使用一组相互隔离的泊坞窗容器。任何标准CI服务（CircleCI，TravisCI等）都具有执行此功能的能力。我们自动利用它们的环境变量使并行化成为可能，而无需您进行任何配置。

trans-unit.source: Cypress can optionally act as your web server
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯可以选择作为你的网络服务器。

trans-unit.source: Cypress can record your tests and make the results available in the Cypress Dashboard.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯可以记录您的测试并将结果显示在赛普拉斯仪表板上。

trans-unit.source: Cypress can run recorded tests in parallel across multiple machines since version 3.1.0. While parallel tests can also technically run on a single machine, we do not recommend it since this machine would require significant resources to run your tests efficiently.
trans-unit.target: 从3.1.0版开始，赛普拉斯可以在多台计算机上并行运行记录的测试。尽管并行测试在技术上也可以在一台计算机上运行，​​但我们不建议您这样做，因为这台计算机需要大量资源才能有效地运行测试。

trans-unit.source: Cypress can run tests in parallel across multiple machines.
trans-unit.target: Cypress可以在多台机器上并行运行测试。

trans-unit.source: Cypress can test anything that runs in a browser.
trans-unit.target: Cypress可以测试任何在浏览器中运行的东西。

trans-unit.source: Cypress cannot execute commands outside a running test
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯不能在运行中的测试之外执行命令

trans-unit.source: Cypress cannot yield you primitive values isolated away from other commands. That is because Cypress commands act internally like an asynchronous stream of data that only resolve after being affected and modified by other commands. This means we cannot yield you discrete values in chunks because we have to know everything about what you expect before handing off a value.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯无法产生与其他命令隔离开的原始值。这是因为赛普拉斯命令在内部的作用类似于异步数据流，该数据流仅在受到其他命令的影响和修改后才能解析。这意味着我们无法分块地产生离散值，因为我们必须在交出值之前了解所有有关您期望的内容。

trans-unit.source: Cypress checks a lot of things to determine an element’s visibility.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯会检查很多事情以确定元素的可见性。

trans-unit.source: Cypress checks whether an element’s disabled property is true.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯会检查元素的 disabled 属性是否为 true 。

trans-unit.source: Cypress checks whether an element’s readonly property is set during .type().
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯会检查在 .type() 期间是否设置了元素的 readonly 属性。

trans-unit.source: Cypress clears any existing screenshots before cypress run. If you do not want to clear your screenshots folder before a run, you can set trashAssetsBeforeRuns to false.

trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯 cypress run 之前，赛普拉斯会清除所有现有视频。如果您不想在运行前清除视频文件夹，则可以将 trashAssetsBeforeRuns 设置为 false 。

trans-unit.source: Cypress comes built in with the ability to stub and spy with cy.stub(), cy.spy() or modify your application’s time with cy.clock() - which lets you manipulate Date, setTimeout, setInterval, amongst others.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯内置了可以使用 cy.stub() ， cy.spy() 进行存根和监视或使用cy.clock（）修改应用程序的时间的 cy.clock() -允许您操作 Date ， setTimeout ， setInterval 等。

trans-unit.source: Cypress commands do not return their subjects, they yield them. Remember: Cypress commands are asynchronous and get queued for execution at a later time. During execution, subjects are yielded from one command to the next, and a lot of helpful Cypress code runs between each command to ensure everything is in order.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯命令不返回其主题，而是产生它们。请记住：赛普拉斯命令是异步的，并且会排队等待稍后执行。在执行期间，主题从一个命令转移到下一个命令，并且在每个命令之间运行了许多有用的赛普拉斯代码，以确保一切正常。

trans-unit.source: Cypress does not actually make an XHR request from the browser. We are actually making the HTTP request from the Cypress Test Runner (in Node). So, you won’t see the request inside of your Developer Tools.

trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯目前不考虑 pointer-events: none 单击算法中没有。如果您需要解决此问题，请打开一个问题。

trans-unit.source: Cypress does not instrument your code - you need to do it yourself. The golden standard for JavaScript code instrumentation is the battle-hardened Istanbul and, luckily, it plays very nicely with the Cypress Test Runner. You can instrument the code as a build step through one of two ways:
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯不会检测您的代码-您需要自己执行。JavaScript代码工具的黄金标准是经过艰苦奋战的伊斯坦布尔，而且幸运的是，它与Cypress Test Runner的配合非常好。您可以通过以下两种方法之一来检测代码作为构建步骤：

trans-unit.source: Cypress does some pretty interesting things under the hood to make testing HTTPs sites work. Cypress enables you to control and stub at the network level. Therefore, Cypress must assign and manage browser certificates to be able to modify the traffic in real time. You’ll notice Chrome display a warning that the ‘SSL certificate does not match’. This is normal and correct. Under the hood we act as our own CA authority and issue certificates dynamically in order to intercept requests otherwise impossible to access. We only do this for the superdomain currently under test, and bypass other traffic. That’s why if you open a tab in Cypress to another host, the certificates match as expected.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯在幕后做了一些非常有趣的事情，以使测试HTTPs站点正常工作。赛普拉斯使您可以在网络级别进行控制和存根。因此，赛普拉斯必须分配和管理浏览器证书，以便能够实时修改流量。您会注意到Chrome显示“ SSL证书不匹配”的警告。这是正常且正确的。在幕后，我们充当自己的CA机构，并动态颁发证书，以拦截否则无法访问的请求。我们仅对当前正在测试的超域执行此操作，并绕过其他流量。这就是为什么如果您在Cypress中打开标签页到另一台主机，则证书会按预期匹配。

trans-unit.source: Cypress does this by spawning an independent child_process which then requires in your pluginsFile. This is similar to the way Visual Studio Code or Atom works.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯通过生成一个独立的 child_process 来实现此目的，然后在您的 pluginsFile 中 requires 它。这类似于Visual Studio Code或Atom的工作方式。

trans-unit.source: Cypress doesn’t kick off the browser automation magic until the test function exits.
trans-unit.target: 在测试功能退出之前，赛普拉斯不会启动浏览器自动化的魔力。

trans-unit.source: Cypress ecosystem
trans-unit.target: 柏树生态系统

trans-unit.source: Cypress emits a series of events as it runs in your browser.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯在你的浏览器中运行时,会发出一系列事件。

trans-unit.source: Cypress enables you to dynamically modify configuration values and environment variables from your plugin file.
trans-unit.target: Cypress使你能够从你的插件文件中动态修改配置值和环境变量。

trans-unit.source: Cypress enables you to write all types of tests:
trans-unit.target: Cypress使你能够编写所有类型的测试。

trans-unit.source: Cypress errors because it can’t interact with “dead” elements - just like a real user could not do this either. Understanding how this happens is very important - and it is often easy to prevent.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯会出错，因为它无法与“死”元素进行交互-就像真实用户也无法做到这一点一样。了解这种情况的发生非常重要-而且通常很容易预防。

trans-unit.source: Cypress executes the vast majority of its commands inside the browser, so there is no network lag. Commands execute and drive your application as fast as it is capable of rendering. To deal with modern JavaScript frameworks with complex UI’s, you use assertions to tell Cypress what the desired state of your application should be. Cypress will automatically wait for your application to reach this state before moving on. You are completely insulated from fussing with manual waits or retries. Cypress automatically waits for elements to exist and will never yield you stale elements that have been detached from the DOM.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯在浏览器中执行其绝大部分命令，因此没有网络延迟。命令以尽可能快的速度执行并驱动您的应用程序。为了处理具有复杂UI的现代JavaScript框架，您可以使用断言来告诉Cypress应用程序所需的状态是什么。赛普拉斯将继续自动等待您的应用程序达到此状态。您完全可以避免手动等待或重试而大惊小怪。赛普拉斯会自动等待元素存在，并且永远不会产生与DOM分离的陈旧元素。

trans-unit.source: Cypress generates its own isolated profile apart from your normal browser profile. This means things like history entries, cookies, and 3rd party extensions from your regular browsing session will not affect your tests in Cypress.
trans-unit.target: 除正常的浏览器配置文件外，赛普拉斯还会生成自己的隔离配置文件。这意味着您的常规浏览会话中的 history 条目， cookies 和 3rd party extensions 将不会影响您在赛普拉斯中的测试。

trans-unit.source: Cypress gives you a simple interface to automatically preserve cookies for multiple tests. Cypress automatically clears all cookies before each new test starts by default.
trans-unit.target: Cypress为你提供了一个简单的界面,可以自动保存多个测试的cookies。Cypress默认在每次新的测试开始前自动清除所有cookies。

trans-unit.source: Cypress gives you the option to dynamically alter configuration values. This is helpful when running Cypress in multiple environments and on multiple developer machines.
trans-unit.target: Cypress为您提供了动态改变配置值的选项。当在多个环境和多个开发机器上运行Cypress时,这很有帮助。

trans-unit.source: Cypress guarantees that it will execute all of its commands deterministically and identically every time they are run.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯保证它将在每次运行时确定且相同地执行所有命令。

trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯采用了Mocha的 bdd 语法，该语法非常适合集成和单元测试。您将编写的所有测试均基于Mocha提供的基本工具，即：

trans-unit.source: Cypress has also built-in sinon-chai support, so any assertions supported by sinon-chai can be used without any configuration.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯还内置兴农齐的支持，所以任何通过支持断言 sinon-chai 无需任何配置中使用。

trans-unit.source: Cypress has many more configuration options you can use to customize its behavior. Things like where your tests live, default timeout periods, environment variables, which reporter to use, etc.
trans-unit.target: Cypress有更多的配置选项,你可以用来定制它的行为。比如你的测试在哪里,默认的超时时间,环境变量,使用哪个报告器等等。

trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯具有一些新增功能，可以快速参考过去的主题，称为别名。看起来像这样：

trans-unit.source: Cypress indicates whether an XHR sent back a stubbed response or actually went out to a server in its Command Log
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯在其命令日志中指出XHR是发回了一个存根响应,还是真的发到了服务器上。

trans-unit.source: Cypress internally uses this method everywhere to figure out whether an element can be scrolled, mostly for actionability.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯内部到处都使用此方法来确定某个元素是否可以滚动，主要是为了提高可操作性。

trans-unit.source: Cypress internally uses this method everywhere to figure out whether an element is hidden, mostly for actionability.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯内部各处都在使用此方法来确定某个元素是否被隐藏，主要是为了提高可操作性。

trans-unit.source: Cypress is Not Like jQuery
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯不像 jQuery

trans-unit.source: Cypress is Like jQuery
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯就像jQuery

trans-unit.source: Cypress is a functional Test Runner. It drives the web application the way a user would, and checks if the app functions as expected: if the expected message appears, an element is removed, or a CSS class is added after the appropriate user action. A typical Cypress test, for example, can check if a toggled “Todo” item gets a class of “completed” after the .toggle is checked:
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯是功能强大的测试运行器。它驱动web应用程序的方式，用户会，并检查是否该应用的功能按照预期：如果出现期望的消息，一个元件被去除，或者一个CSS类适当的用户动作之后加入。例如，典型的赛普拉斯测试可以检查 .toggle 之后，检查切换的“ Todo”项目是否获得“完成”类：

trans-unit.source: Cypress is a desktop application that is installed on your computer. The desktop application supports these operating systems:
trans-unit.target: Cypress是一款安装在电脑上的桌面应用程序。该桌面应用程序支持这些操作系统。

trans-unit.source: Cypress is a global object that persists for the entirety of all of your tests. Any events you bind to Cypress will apply to all tests, and will not be unbound unless you manually unbind them.
trans-unit.target: Cypress是一个全局对象,它对所有的测试都是持久的。您绑定到Cypress的任何事件都将适用于所有测试,除非您手动解除绑定,否则不会解除绑定。

trans-unit.source: Cypress is a next generation front end testing tool built for the modern web. We address the key pain points developers and QA engineers face when testing modern applications.
trans-unit.target: Cypress是一款为现代网络打造的新一代前端测试工具。我们解决了开发人员和QA工程师在测试现代应用程序时面临的关键痛点。

trans-unit.source: Cypress is a rather large and complex project involving a dozen or more submodules, and the default output can be overwhelming.
trans-unit.target: Cypress是一个相当庞大和复杂的项目,涉及十几个子模块,默认的输出会让人不知所措。

trans-unit.source: Cypress is a specialized tool that does one thing really well: end-to-end testing web applications while they are under development. You should not use Cypress for things it is not designed for such as:
trans-unit.target: Cypress是一个专门的工具,它能很好地完成一件事:在网络应用程序开发中进行端到端测试。你不应该使用Cypress来做一些它没有设计好的事情,比如:。

trans-unit.source: Cypress is built around creating reliable tests. The secret to writing good tests is to provide as much “state” and “facts” to Cypress and to “guard it” from issuing new commands until your application has reached the desired state it needs to proceed.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯致力于创建可靠的测试。编写良好测试的秘诀是为赛普拉斯提供尽可能多的“状态”和“事实”，并“防止”发布新命令，直到您的应用程序达到所需的状态为止。

trans-unit.source: Cypress is built on top of Mocha and Chai. We support both Chai’s BDD and TDD assertion styles. Tests you write in Cypress will mostly adhere to this style.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯建立在摩卡和柴之上。我们支持Chai的 BDD 和 TDD 断言样式。您在赛普拉斯（Cypress）上编写的测试大多会遵循这种风格。

trans-unit.source: Cypress is built using Promises that come from Bluebird. However, Cypress commands do not return these typical Promise instances. Instead we return what’s called a Chainer that acts like a layer sitting on top of the internal Promise instances.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯使用Bluebird的 Promises构建。但是，赛普拉斯命令不会返回这些典型的Promise实例。相反，我们返回所谓的 Chainer ，它就像位于内部Promise实例顶部的一层一样。

trans-unit.source: Cypress is built using the debug module. That means you can receive helpful debugging output by running Cypress with this turned on prior to running cypress open or cypress run.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯是使用调试模块构建的。这意味着，在运行 cypress open 或 cypress run 之前，先将其打开并运行Cypress可以收到有用的调试输出。

trans-unit.source: Cypress is built using the debug module. That means you can receive helpful debugging output by running Cypress with this turned on. Note: you will see a LOT of messages when running with DEBUG=... setting.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯是使用调试模块构建的。这意味着您可以通过在打开赛普拉斯的情况下运行它来获得有用的调试输出。注意：使用 DEBUG=... 设置运行时，您将看到很多消息。

trans-unit.source: Cypress is built, and optimized around being a tool for your daily local development. In fact, after you start using Cypress for awhile, we believe that you may find it useful to even do all of your development in it.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯的构建和优化使其成为您日常本地开发的工具。实际上，在您开始使用赛普拉斯一段时间后，我们相信您甚至可以在其中进行所有开发。

trans-unit.source: Cypress is currently seeking to raise a Series A. This will enable us to grow the team and speed up development but seeking it has come at a ost for current development speed. If you have any VC connections please send them our way.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯目前正在寻求筹集A轮融资。这将使我们能够扩大团队规模并加快开发速度，但寻求以目前的开发速度为代价。如果您有任何VC连接，请发送给我们。

trans-unit.source: Cypress is most often compared to Selenium; however Cypress is both fundamentally and architecturally different. Cypress is not constrained by the same restrictions as Selenium.
trans-unit.target: Cypress最常被拿来与Selenium比较,然而Cypress在根本上和架构上都是不同的。Cypress不受与Selenium相同的限制。

trans-unit.source: Cypress is not a general purpose web automation tool. It is poorly suited for scripting live, production websites not under your control.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯不是通用的 Web自动化工具。它不太适合脚本控制的实时生产网站。

trans-unit.source: Cypress is not a general purpose automation tool.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯不是通用的自动化工具。

trans-unit.source: Cypress is now open source! This project is licensed under the terms of the MIT License.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯现已开放源代码！该项目是根据MIT许可条款获得许可的。

trans-unit.source: Cypress is now able to run all the tests, run in the terminal, and includes support for Linux and CI. Additionally, most of the functionality of he GUI Desktop App can now be accessed through command line arguments.
trans-unit.target: Cypress现在能够运行所有的测试,在终端中运行,并包括对Linux和CI的支持。此外,他的GUI桌面应用程序的大部分功能现在可以通过命令行参数访问。

trans-unit.source: Cypress is versioned like any other dependency.
trans-unit.target: Cypress和其他的依赖关系一样,都是有版本的。

trans-unit.source: Cypress knows and understands everything that happens in your application synchronously. It is notified the moment the page loads and the moment the page unloads. It is impossible for Cypress to miss elements when it fires events. Cypress even knows how fast an element is animating and will wait for it to stop animating on specific network requests to finish.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯同时了解和理解应用程序中发生的所有事情。在页面加载和页面卸载时都会收到通知。赛普拉斯在触发事件时不会丢失任何元素。赛普拉斯甚至知道元素的动画制作速度如何，并将在特定的网络请求完成后等待它停止动画制作。

trans-unit.source: Cypress launches the browser in a way that’s different from a regular browser environment. But it launches in a way that we believe makes testing more reliable and accessible.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯以与常规浏览器环境不同的方式启动浏览器。但是它以我们认为使测试更加可靠和可访问的方式启动。

trans-unit.source: Cypress leverages jQuery’s powerful selector engine to help make tests familiar and readable for modern web developers.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯利用jQuery强大的选择器引擎来帮助测试使现代Web开发人员熟悉并可读。

trans-unit.source: Cypress logo now displays in About Page.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯徽标现在显示在“ About Page 。

trans-unit.source: Cypress maintains an official list of plugins created by us and the community. You can npm install any of the plugins listed below:
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯维护着由我们和社区创建的插件的正式列表。您可以 npm install 以下列出的任何插件：

trans-unit.source: Cypress maintains some local application data in order to save user preferences and more quickly start up. Sometimes this data can become corrupted. You may fix an issue you have by clearing this app data.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯会维护一些本地应用数据,以便保存用户的偏好和更快速地启动。有时,这些数据可能会损坏。你可以通过清除这些应用数据来解决你的问题。

trans-unit.source: Cypress makes it easy to chain assertions together.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯可以很容易地将论断串联起来。

trans-unit.source: Cypress makes it easy to stub a network requests and have it respond instantly with fixture data.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯使其能够轻松地处理网络请求,并使其能够即时响应夹具数据。

trans-unit.source: Cypress makes it easy to stub a response and control the body, status, headers, or even delay.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯使响应响应变得容易，并可以控制 body ， status ， headers 甚至延迟。

trans-unit.source: Cypress makes it easy to test the entire lifecycle of Ajax / XHR requests within your application. Cypress provides you direct access to the XHR objects, enabling you to make assertions about its properties. Additionally you can even stub and mock a request’s response.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯使您可以轻松地在应用程序中测试Ajax / XHR请求的整个生命周期。赛普拉斯为您提供对XHR对象的直接访问，使您能够对其XHR属性进行断言。另外，您甚至可以存根并模拟请求的响应。

trans-unit.source: Cypress modifies these scripts at the network level, and therefore there is a tiny performance cost to search the response streams for these patterns.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯在网络层面修改这些脚本,因此搜索响应流以寻找这些模式会有极小的性能成本。

trans-unit.source: Cypress needs Internet access to work. Many companies require the use of a corporate proxy to access the Internet. If your company does this, many functions of Cypress will not work until you’ve configured Cypress to use your proxy:
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯需要Internet才能正常工作。许多公司要求使用公司代理访问Internet。如果您的公司这样做，则在将赛普拉斯配置为使用代理之前，赛普拉斯的许多功能将无法使用：

trans-unit.source: Cypress no longer accidentally prints internal Electron logs when running cypress run. This bug would exhibit itself when verifying and running Cypress the first time after installation. You may have seen these logs when running in CI. Fixes #4255.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯运行时不再意外打印内部电子日志 cypress run 。安装后首次验证和运行Cypress时，该错误会表现出来。在CI中运行时，您可能已经看到这些日志。修复＃4255。

trans-unit.source: Cypress no longer automatically takes screenshots of skipped tests. Fixes #2368.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯不再自动拍摄跳过的测试的屏幕截图。修复＃2368。

trans-unit.source: Cypress no longer copies screenshots and videos to artifacts for CircleCI. Copying artifacts should be left up to the user to handle themselves in their circle.yml file. Fixes #1592.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯不再将屏幕截图和视频复制到CircleCI的工件中。复制工件应留给用户在自己的 circle.yml 文件中处理。修复＃1592。

trans-unit.source: Cypress no longer crashes on initial cy.visit() when the 3rd party web server never ends the response. Fixes #272.
trans-unit.target: 当第三方Web服务器永不结束响应时，赛普拉斯不再在初始 cy.visit() 上崩溃。修复＃272。

trans-unit.source: Cypress no longer crashes when a 3rd party server sends invalid gzip content. Also fixed issues with incorrectly gunzipping multibyte characters which would potentially lead to serving invalid HTML or JS. Fixes #1396 and #1756.
trans-unit.target: 当第三方服务器发送无效的 gzip 内容时，赛普拉斯不再崩溃。还解决了错误地将多字节字符压缩为多字节字符的问题，这有可能导致提供无效的HTML或JS。修复＃1396和＃1756。

trans-unit.source: Cypress no longer crashes when attempting to proxy a WebSocket connection that fails. Fixes #556.
trans-unit.target: 尝试代理失败的WebSocket连接时，赛普拉斯不再崩溃。修复＃556。

trans-unit.source: Cypress no longer crashes when you click links in the on-boarding screen called “To help you get started…”. Fixes #227.
trans-unit.target: 当您单击入门页面上名为“帮助您入门……”的链接时，赛普拉斯不再崩溃。修复＃227。

trans-unit.source: Cypress no longer errors when you return a raw DOM element. It now correctly wraps this as the new subject.
trans-unit.target: 当你返回一个原始DOM元素时,Cypress不再出错。它现在正确地将其包装为新的主题。

trans-unit.source: Cypress no longer incorrectly errors when calling cy.window().screenshot(), cy.window().scrollTo() or cy.window().trigger() in an application with multiple iframes. Fixes #4396.
trans-unit.target: 在具有多个iframe的应用程序中调用 cy.window().screenshot() ， cy.window().scrollTo() 或 cy.window().trigger() ，赛普拉斯不再会错误地出错。修复＃4396。

trans-unit.source: Cypress no longer looks at your tests directory for test files. Now, by default, it looks in the cypress/integration directory.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯不再在 tests 目录中查找测试文件。现在，默认情况下，它位于 cypress/integration 目录中。

trans-unit.source: Cypress no longer reports Electron as the browser that ran in the Dashboard Service when a different browser was run. Fixes #854.
trans-unit.target: 当运行其他浏览器时，赛普拉斯不再将 Electron 报告为在Dashboard Service中运行的浏览器。修复＃854。

trans-unit.source: Cypress no longer watches files when run using cypress run. This will fix some runs that were crashing with an ENOSPC error. Fixes #4283.
trans-unit.target: 当使用 cypress run 运行时，赛普拉斯不再监视文件。这将修复某些因 ENOSPC 错误而崩溃的运行。修复＃4283。

trans-unit.source: Cypress now “remembers” the last browser you had open and will suggest opening that whenever a project is opened. Addresses #193.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯现在“记住”您上次打开的浏览器，并会建议您在每次打开项目时都打开它。地址＃193。

trans-unit.source: Cypress now always updates the remote URL whenever your application changes its URL through the vast variety of ways it can do this.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯现在每当你的应用程序改变其URL时,它总是通过大量的方式来更新远程URL。

trans-unit.source: Cypress now applies cookies to the browser which were cleared between redirects. Fixes #224.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯现在将cookie应用于浏览器，这些cookie在两次重定向之间被清除。修复＃224。

trans-unit.source: Cypress now auto reloads when spec files are modified in Windows. Fixes #712.
trans-unit.target: 现在，在Windows中修改规格文件时，赛普拉斯会自动重新加载。修复＃712。

trans-unit.source: Cypress now automatically detects and waits for an element which is animating to stop animating. The threshold that Cypress considers animating is set to a distance of 5px per 60fps. In other words, if your element is moving too fast for a user to interact with, then Cypress considers the element animating and will wait until it finishes before attempting to interact with it. When we say ‘interact’ we mean apply command actions like .click(), .select(), .type(), .check(), etc. Waiting for animations prevents a series of edge cases and weird bugs where Cypress was interacting with elements too quickly which might cause undesired side effects in your application which are hard to track down. The downside to this implementation is that for every action Cypress must wait at least 2 run loops before applying actions. This slows down every action command by about 32ms. If your app does not use animations you may wish to turn off this behavior in your cypress.json file.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯现在可以自动检测并等待要动画的元素停止动画。赛普拉斯考虑制作动画的阈值设置为每 60fps 5px 的距离。换句话说，如果您的元素移动得太快而无法与用户进行交互，则赛普拉斯会认为该元素正在设置动画，并会等到它完成后再尝试与之交互。当我们说“互动”，我们的意思是像应用命令操作 .click() 。 .select() ， .type() 。 .check() 等等待动画防止了一系列的边缘情况和莫名其妙的错误，其中赛普拉斯是互动与元素太可能会在应用程序中快速导致不良后果，而这些副作用很难追踪。此实现的不利之处在于，对于每个动作，赛普拉斯必须至少等待2个运行循环才能应用动作。这会使每个操作命令的速度降低约 32ms 。如果您的应用程序不使用动画，则您可能希望在 cypress.json 文件中关闭此行为。

trans-unit.source: Cypress now automatically reads from your system’s HTTP_PROXY, HTTPS_PROXY, and NO_PROXY environment variables and proxies traffic accordingly through Cypress based on these values. This includes network traffic within your application under test, when downloading Cypress, and when accessing ‘Runs’ within the Test Runner. Please read our new Proxy Configuration doc to understand more about proxy configuration in Cypress. Fixes #672, #733, #939, #1039, #1459, #1469, #1470, #1541, #1608, #2295, #3855, #3865, #1401 and #3857.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯现在会自动从系统的 HTTP_PROXY ， HTTPS_PROXY 和 NO_PROXY 环境变量中读取数据，并根据这些值相应地通过赛普拉斯代理流量。这包括被测应用程序内，下载赛普拉斯时以及在测试运行程序中访问“运行”时的网络流量。请阅读我们新的《代理配置》文档，以了解有关赛普拉斯中代理配置的更多信息。修复＃672，＃733，＃939，＃1039，＃1459，＃1469，＃1470，＃1541，＃1608，＃2295，＃3855，＃3865，＃1401和＃3857。

trans-unit.source: Cypress now caches globally per version which prevents it from being installed multiple times across projects.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯现在对每个版本进行全局缓存,这样可以防止它在不同项目中被多次安装。

trans-unit.source: Cypress now correctly exits during cypress run in linux when the browser fails to connect. Fixes #333.
trans-unit.target: 现在，当浏览器无法连接时，在 linux 中的 cypress run 期间，Cypress可以正确退出。修复＃333。

trans-unit.source: Cypress now correctly exits during cypress run in linux when there is a spec bundle error. Fixes #337.
trans-unit.target: 现在，当出现规格捆绑包错误时，在 linux 中的 cypress run 期间，赛普拉斯可以正确退出。修复＃337。

trans-unit.source: Cypress now correctly handles blur and focus events in situations where the browser has lost focus. Fixes #4039, #1176, and #1486.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯现在可以在浏览器失去焦点的情况下正确处理 blur 和 focus 事件。修复＃4039，＃1176和＃1486。

trans-unit.source: Cypress now correctly injects and handles pages which are missing a <head>, a <body>, or even an <html> tag. Previously it would bomb on pages missing these tags.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯现在可以正确地注入并处理缺少 <head> ， <body >甚至 <html> 标签的页面。以前，它会在缺少这些标签的页面上爆炸。

trans-unit.source: Cypress now correctly proxies WebSockets that are pointed at the local Cypress server (typically localhost:2020). Because most users use Socket.io, when Socket.io could not correctly connect over WebSockets it would fall back to XHR polling. You may notice many less XHR requests in your command log (which is the intended behavior).
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯现在可以正确代理指向本地赛普拉斯服务器的WebSocket（通常是 localhost:2020 ）。因为大多数用户使用Socket.io，所以当Socket.io无法通过WebSockets正确连接时，它将退回到XHR轮询。您可能会在命令日志中注意到更少的XHR请求（这是预期的行为）。

trans-unit.source: Cypress now correctly re-bundles files even when watchForFileChanges is set to false. Fixes #446 and #347.
trans-unit.target: 现在，即使将 watchForFileChanges 设置为 false ,赛普拉斯也可以正确地重新捆绑文件。修复＃446和＃347。

trans-unit.source: Cypress now correctly sets cookies with expirationDate in the past. Chrome did not handle these cookies as documented and our code did not take this into account. We also added a lot more e2e tests around this behavior. Fixes #266.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯现在可以使用过去的 expirationDate 正确设置Cookie 。Chrome并未按照记录处理这些Cookie，我们的代码也未考虑到这一点。我们还针对此行为添加了更多的 e2e 测试。修复＃266。

trans-unit.source: Cypress now correctly works offline on Windows when visiting a localhost URL. Fixes #4763.
trans-unit.target: 现在，当访问本地URL时，赛普拉斯可以在Windows上正确地脱机工作。修复＃4763。

trans-unit.source: Cypress now detects more instances of browser installations. Fixes #3183 and #3218.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯现在可以检测更多 browser 安装实例。修复＃3183和＃3218。

trans-unit.source: Cypress now detects the difference between a forced async done test timeout vs a regular command timeout, and will throw the appropriate message indicating whether the user forgot to invoke done or whether the timeout happened due to a command.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯现在检测到强制异步 done 测试超时与常规命令超时之间的差异，并会抛出适当的消息，指示用户是否忘记调用 done 或超时是否由于命令而发生。

trans-unit.source: Cypress now detects when an async test is passed and not all commands have finished running. It will throw an explicit error message in this situation.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯现在可以检测到异步测试通过后,并非所有命令都已完成运行。在这种情况下,它将抛出一条明确的错误信息。

trans-unit.source: Cypress now displays a message when the Desktop App update is actually being applied instead of doing nothing and looking like it’s crashed.
trans-unit.target: 现在，当实际应用Desktop App更新时，赛普拉斯会显示一条消息，而不是什么也不做，看起来像崩溃了一样。

trans-unit.source: Cypress now errors when the body paramater passed to cy.request() contains a circular reference. Fixed in #4407.
trans-unit.target: 当传递给 cy.request() 的 body 参数包含循环引用时，赛普拉斯现在会出错。已在＃4407中修复。

trans-unit.source: Cypress now forces the initial cy.visit() not to be cached by the browser. This was incorrectly being cached which meant when you changed the cy.visit() it would not actually go out and fetch the new contents. Previously you had to check Disable Cache in the Network Tab inside of Chrome to prevent this bug. Unfortunately this has a significant performance drawback. If you use a cy.visit() before each test you will notice a degrade in performance because this request is no longer cached. This is a temporary problem until Cypress implements a more sophisticated caching strategy which optimizes these concerns. There is a lot to improve in this arena but it will take more time before it’s implemented.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯现在强制初始 cy.visit() 不被浏览器缓存。这被错误地缓存了，这意味着当您更改 cy.visit() 时,它实际上不会退出并获取新内容。以前，您必须在Chrome内部的“ Network Tab 选中“ Disable Cache ，以防止此错误。不幸的是，这具有明显的性能缺陷。如果在每次测试之前使用 cy.visit() ，您将注意到性能降低，因为该请求不再被缓存。直到赛普拉斯实施更优化这些问题的更先进的缓存策略之前，这都是一个暂时的问题。在这个领域有很多地方可以改进，但是要实施它还需要更多时间。

trans-unit.source: Cypress now handles length and exist assertion chainers in a very specific way, providing a detailed message on failure, and utomatically slices out any stale element references.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯现在以一种非常特定的方式处理 length 和 exist 断言链接器，提供有关失败的详细消息，并自动切出所有过时的元素引用。

trans-unit.source: Cypress now handles events property when a DOM element is removed during a .click() event. As per the spec, if mousedown causes element removal then mouseup and click and focus events will not be fired. Additionally if removal happens during mouseup then click event will not be fired. Also updated the onConsole groups to only display and indicate the events which actually fired. Fixes #109.
trans-unit.target: 当在 .click() 事件期间删除DOM元素时，赛普拉斯现在可以处理events属性。根据规范，如果 mousedown 导致元素删除，则不会触发 mouseup 以及 click 和 focus 事件。此外，如果在 mouseup 期间发生移除，则不会触发 click 事件。还更新了 onConsole 组，使其仅显示和指示实际触发的事件。修复＃109。

trans-unit.source: Cypress now has first class support for fixtures (official docs coming soon).
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯现在对 fixtures 一流的支持（即将推出官方文档）。

trans-unit.source: Cypress now logs out your project’s API key on a failed CI run.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯现在在失败的CI运行中注销您项目的API密钥。

trans-unit.source: Cypress now looks for any npm proxy configuration values as a fallback when no other system proxy configuration is found. This brings this feature into parity with how npm reads off proxy configuration values during an npm install. Addresses #4719.
trans-unit.target: 现在，当未找到其他系统代理配置时，赛普拉斯将查找任何npm代理配置值作为备用。这使此功能与npm在 npm install 期间如何读取代理配置值相等。地址＃4719。

trans-unit.source: Cypress now only scans for spec changes when the watcher sees changes, rather than polling to scan. Addresses #3069.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯现在仅在观察者看到更改时才扫描规格更改，而不轮询来扫描。地址＃3069。

trans-unit.source: Cypress now outputs its version when passed the --version argument
trans-unit.target: 当传递 --version 参数时，赛普拉斯现在输出其版本

trans-unit.source: Cypress now overrides chai’s match chainer and provides a specific error message when a non regex value is provided. Fixes #58.
trans-unit.target: 现在，赛普拉斯会覆盖chai的 match 链接器,并在提供非 regex 值时提供特定的错误消息。修复＃58。

trans-unit.source: Cypress now properly handles typing JavaScript object prototype methods (like hasOwnProperty) into .type(). Fixes #3423.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯现在可以正确地将JavaScript对象原型方法（如 hasOwnProperty ）键入 .type() 。修复＃3423。

trans-unit.source: Cypress now properly parses environment variables with empty values. Fixes #3742.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯现在可以正确解析具有空值的环境变量。修复＃3742。

trans-unit.source: Cypress now properly supports partial matching of string values for assertions contain.text, contain.html, and contain.value. Fixes #1969.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯现在正确支持断言 contain.text ， contain.html 和 contain.value 的字符串值的部分匹配。修复＃1969。

trans-unit.source: Cypress now requires a viewport to be issued at all times. By default it is 1000x660 but can be changed in your cypress.json file with he keys: viewportWidth and viewportHeight.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯现在需要始终发布视口。默认情况下为 1000x660 ,但可以使用以下键在您的 cypress.json 文件中进行更改： viewportWidth 和 viewportHeight 。

trans-unit.source: Cypress now retries multiple times (with a backoff strategy) when communicating with our API fails while recording runs. This will provide better feedback in situations when the API is temporarily unavailable. Fixes #1590.
trans-unit.target: 当录制运行期间与我们的API通讯失败时，赛普拉斯现在会重试多次（具有退避策略）。当API暂时不可用时，这将提供更好的反馈。修复＃1590。

trans-unit.source: Cypress now retries up to 3 times for the browser to connect during cypress run. The warning / error messages were also updated to be clearer. Partially addresses #334.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯现在最多可重试3次，以使浏览器在 cypress run 期间可以连接。警告/错误消息也已更新为更清晰。部分地址＃334。

trans-unit.source: Cypress now scrolls all parent containers (not just window) when attempting to check an element’s actionability. Fixes #569.
trans-unit.target: 现在，当尝试检查某个元素的可操作性时，赛普拉斯会滚动所有父容器（而不仅仅是 window ）。修复＃569。

trans-unit.source: Cypress now silently restarts the server whenever it detects a change to cypress.json - meaning you no longer have to manually reboot the server for changes to be picked up.
trans-unit.target: 现在，当Cypress检测到对 cypress.json 的更改时，它会以静默方式重新启动服务器-这意味着您不再需要手动重新引导服务器即可获取更改。

trans-unit.source: Cypress now throws a specific error message (with a link to further explanation) if you attempt to run commands outside of a test. Usually this happens accidentally when you write cy.commands inside of a describe or context block instead of the it. I’ve wasted too much time and almost bombed entire presentations / demos so I’ve finally stopped this from ever happening again. If you ever see this error message, trust me, you will forever thank me.
trans-unit.target: 如果您尝试在测试之外运行命令，赛普拉斯现在会抛出一条特定的错误消息（带有指向进一步说明的链接）。通常当你写这发生意外 cy.commands 一个内部 describe 或 context 块来代替 it 。我浪费了太多时间，几乎炸毁了整个演示文稿/演示，所以我终于阻止了这种再次发生。如果您看到此错误消息，请相信我，您将永远感谢我。

trans-unit.source: Cypress now throws on .should() if any DOM member isn’t in the DOM, except for exist assertions.
trans-unit.target: 柏树现在抛出上 .should() 如果任何DOM部件不DOM中，除了 exist 的断言。

trans-unit.source: Cypress now throws on eventually.have.length assertions. Use implicit {length: n} command options instead.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯现在抛出了 eventually.have.length 断言。请改用隐式 {length: n} 命令选项。

trans-unit.source: Cypress now uses the body instead of headers to send external requests. Fixes #148.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯现在使用正文而不是标题发送外部请求。修复＃148。

trans-unit.source: Cypress now verifies it can run on your system prior to actually running. It’ll do this for each new version the first time you try to use it. Errors it receives from attempting to run will bubble up nicely, so you’ll get output for things like missing linux dependencies instead of absolutely nothing like before.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯现在验证它是否可以在实际运行之前在您的系统上运行。首次尝试使用每个新版本时，都会执行此操作。它从尝试运行时收到的错误将冒泡，因此您将获得诸如缺少linux依赖项之类的输出，而不是像以前那样绝对没有得到任何输出。

trans-unit.source: Cypress now waits 20s (which matches cy.visit()) for the new page to load instead of 4s previously.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯现在等待 20s cy.visit() 与cy.visit（）匹配）等待新页面加载，而不是之前的 4s 。

trans-unit.source: Cypress now watches all the plugins file‘s entire dependency tree to make iterating on plugins easier. Fixes #1407.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯现在监视所有 plugins file 的整个依赖关系树，以简化插件迭代。修复＃1407。

trans-unit.source: Cypress now works with JS applications that use pushState and replaceState routing (commonly known as HTML5 History) without having to change any application code.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯现在可以使用使用 pushState 和 replaceState 路由的JS应用程序（通常称为 HTML5 History ），而无需更改任何应用程序代码。

trans-unit.source: Cypress offers several different timeout values based on the type of command.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯根据命令的类型提供了几种不同的超时值。

trans-unit.source: Cypress only retries commands that query the DOM: cy.get(), .find(), .contains(), etc. You can check if a particular command is retried by looking at the “Assertions” section in its API documentation. For example, “Assertions section” of .first() tells us that the command is retried until all assertions that follow it are passing.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯仅重命令该查询的DOM： cy.get() ， .find() ,。 .contains() 等，您可以检查是否有特定的命令通过查看它的API文档中的“断言”一节重试。例如， .first() 的 “断言部分” 告诉我们，命令重试，直到其后的所有断言都通过。

trans-unit.source: Cypress opens the test in a browser installed on your system. You can read more about how we do this in Launching Browsers.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯会在系统上安装的浏览器中打开测试。您可以在启动浏览器中了解更多有关我们如何执行此操作的信息。

trans-unit.source: Cypress overrides chai exist assertion to really mean: “does this subject exist in the document?”
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯优先于chai exist 断言，其真正含义是：“该主题是否存在于文档中？”

trans-unit.source: Cypress overrides chai’s default inspection function for DOM elements meaning instead of seeing { Object (0, length, ...) } you will now ee the nicely formatted Cypress DOM element like: <button#primary.btn-large>.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯重写了chai的DOM元素默认检查功能，这意味着您无需再查看 { Object (0, length, ...) } 而是可以看到格式精美的赛普拉斯DOM元素，例如： <button#primary.btn-large> 。

trans-unit.source: Cypress prevents you from being forced to always ‘act like a user’ to generate the state of a given situation. With Cypress you can programmatically interact and control your application. You no longer have to use your UI to build up state.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯可防止您总是被迫“像用户一样”行为以生成给定情况的状态。使用赛普拉斯，您可以以编程方式交互和控制应用程序。您不再需要使用UI来建立状态。

trans-unit.source: Cypress prints out a table of key events that detail the keys that were pressed when clicking on type within the Command Log. Each character will contain the which character code and the events that happened as a result of that key press.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯会打印出一个按键事件表，其中详细列出了在“ 命令日志”中单击类型时所按的按键。每个字符将包含 which 字符代码以及由于该按键而发生的事件。

trans-unit.source: Cypress provides a nice Test Runner that gives you a visual structure of suites, tests, and assertions. Soon you’ll also see commands, page events, network requests, and more.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯提供了一个不错的Test Runner，它使您可以直观地看到套件，测试和断言的结构。不久，您还将看到命令，页面事件，网络请求等。

trans-unit.source: Cypress provides a simple but powerful algorithm when interacting with elements.
trans-unit.target: 与元素交互时，赛普拉斯提供了一种简单但功能强大的算法。

trans-unit.source: Cypress relies on many best-of-breed open source testing libraries to lend stability and familiarity to the platform from the get-go. If you’ve been testing in JavaScript, you’ll recognize many old friends in this list. Understand how we exploit them and hit the ground running with Cypress!
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯依靠许多同类最佳的开源测试库从一开始就为平台提供稳定性和熟悉性。如果您一直在使用JavaScript进行测试，那么您会在此列表中认识许多老朋友。了解我们如何利用它们，并与赛普拉斯一起运转！

trans-unit.source: Cypress respects all default browser behavior when events are canceled.
trans-unit.target: 当事件被取消时,Cypress尊重所有默认的浏览器行为。

trans-unit.source: Cypress respects not firing subsequent events if previous ones were canceled.
trans-unit.target: 如果之前的事件被取消,Cypress尊重不发射后续事件。

trans-unit.source: Cypress runs a series of async lifecycle events that reset state between tests
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯运行一系列异步生命周期事件,在测试之间重置状态

trans-unit.source: Cypress runs as fast as your browser can render content. You can watch tests run in real time as you develop your applications. TDD FTW!
trans-unit.target: Cypress的运行速度与您的浏览器渲染内容的速度一样快。您可以在开发应用程序时观看测试的实时运行。TDD FTW!

trans-unit.source: Cypress runs each spec file in isolation: the browser is exited between specs. Configuration changed in one spec won’t be visible in other specs.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯隔离运行每个规格文件：在规格之间退出浏览器。在一个规格中更改的配置在其他规格中不可见。

trans-unit.source: Cypress runs each spec file in isolation: the browser is exited between specs. Environment variables added or changed in one spec won’t be visible in other specs.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯隔离运行每个规格文件：在规格之间退出浏览器。在一个规格中添加或更改的环境变量在其他规格中不可见。

trans-unit.source: Cypress runs several calculations to ensure an element can actually be interacted with like a real user would. If you’re seeing this error, the solution is often obvious. You may need to guard your commands (due to a timing or an animation issue).
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯进行了几次计算，以确保元素可以像真实用户一样实际进行交互。如果看到此错误，则解决方案通常很明显。您可能需要保护您的命令（由于时间或动画问题）。

trans-unit.source: Cypress runs tests in a unique interactive runner that allows you to see commands as they execute while also viewing the application under test.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯在独特的交互式运行器中运行测试,允许您在执行命令的同时查看被测应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Cypress ships with official type declarations for TypeScript. This allows you to write your tests in TypeScript. All that is required is a little bit of configuration.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯附带官方的类型声明为打字稿。这使您可以使用TypeScript编写测试。所需要做的只是一点点配置。

trans-unit.source: Cypress should run on all CI providers. We have provided some example projects and configuration for some CI providers to help you get started.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯应在所有 CI提供程序上运行。我们为一些CI提供程序提供了一些示例项目和配置示例，以帮助您入门。

trans-unit.source: Cypress should work with self signed SSL certificates now.
trans-unit.target: Cypress现在应该可以使用自签名的SSL证书。

trans-unit.source: Cypress spawns your pluginsFile in its own child process so it is isolated away from the context that Cypress itself runs in. That means you cannot accidentally modify or change Cypress’ own execution in any way.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯 pluginsFile 在其自己的子进程中生成您的pluginsFile，因此它与赛普拉斯本身运行的上下文是隔离的。这意味着您不能以任何方式意外修改或更改赛普拉斯自己的执行。

trans-unit.source: Cypress supports both BDD (expect/should) and TDD (assert) style assertions. Read more about assertions.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯同时支持BDD（ expect / should ）和TDD（ assert ）样式声明。阅读有关断言的更多信息。

trans-unit.source: Cypress supports both ES2015 modules and CommonJS modules. You can import/require npm modules as well as local modules:
trans-unit.target: Cypress同时支持ES2015模块和CommonJS模块。你可以导入/要求npm模块以及本地模块。

trans-unit.source: Cypress supports custom reporters, whether local to your project or installed through npm.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯支持定制报告器，无论是在您的项目本地还是通过npm安装。

trans-unit.source: Cypress takes snapshots of your application and enables you to time travel back to the state it was in when commands ran.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯对你的应用程序进行快照,使你能够回到命令运行时的状态。

trans-unit.source: Cypress taskbar icon now displays correctly in OS X dark theme. Fixes #132.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯任务栏图标现在可以在OS X深色主题中正确显示。修复＃132。

trans-unit.source: Cypress tries to act like a human user would using the browser.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯试图像人类用户使用浏览器那样行事。

trans-unit.source: Cypress type definition now allow a timeout option in cy.hash(). Fixes #3844.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯类型定义现在允许 cy.hash() 中的 timeout 选项。修复＃3844。

trans-unit.source: Cypress ultimately controls the entire automation process from top to bottom, which puts it in the unique position of being able to understand everything happening in and outside of the browser. This means Cypress is capable of delivering more consistent results than any other testing tool.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯最终控制了从上到下的整个自动化过程,这使它处于独特的地位,能够了解浏览器内外发生的一切。这意味着Cypress能够提供比任何其他测试工具更一致的结果。

trans-unit.source: Cypress used to automatically include any scripts in the supportFolder before your test files. However, automatically including all the files in a certain directory is somewhat magical and unintuitive, and requires creating globals for the purpose of utility functions.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯曾经在测试文件之前自动在 supportFolder 中包含任何脚本。但是，自动将所有文件包含在某个目录中是有些神奇和不直观的，并且需要出于实用程序功能的目的而创建全局变量。

trans-unit.source: Cypress uses the @cypress/commit-info package to extract git information to associate with the run (e.g. branch, commit message, author).
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯使用@ cypress / commit-info包来提取git信息以与运行相关联（例如，分支，提交消息，作者）。

trans-unit.source: Cypress uses the debug node module for both the back end server process, and for everything running in the browser (called the driver).
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯将 debug 节点模块用于后端服务器进程以及浏览器中运行的所有程序（称为驱动程序）。

trans-unit.source: Cypress uses your `projectId` and Record Key together to uniquely identify projects.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯同时使用您的`projectId`和Record Key来唯一标识项目。

trans-unit.source: Cypress utilizes a Chrome extension within the Test Runner in order to run properly. If you or your company whitelist specific Chrome extensions, this may cause problems with running Cypress. You will want to ask your administrator to whitelist the Cypress extension ID below:
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯利用测试运行器中的Chrome扩展来正常运行。如果您或您的公司将特定的 Chrome 扩展程序设置为白名单,可能会导致赛普拉斯的运行出现问题。您需要要求您的管理员将以下的赛普拉斯扩展ID列入白名单。

trans-unit.source: Cypress waits for Promises to resolve before continuing
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯要等诺言解决后再继续下去

trans-unit.source: Cypress webpack Preprocessor
trans-unit.target: Cypress webpack预处理程序

trans-unit.source: Cypress will not continue running any other commands until cy.exec() has finished, so a long-running command will drastically slow down your test cycle.
trans-unit.target: 在 cy.exec() 完成之前，赛普拉斯将不会继续运行任何其他命令，因此长时间运行的命令将大大减慢您的测试周期。

trans-unit.source: Cypress will not continue running any other commands until cy.task() has finished, so a long-running command will drastically slow down your test runs.
trans-unit.target: 在 cy.task() 完成之前，赛普拉斯将不会继续运行任何其他命令，因此长时间运行的命令将大大减慢您的测试运行速度。

trans-unit.source: Cypress will strip off the CYPRESS_ when adding your environment variables.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯公司将剥离的 CYPRESS_ 加入你的环境变量的时候。

trans-unit.source: Cypress will assign each spec file to an available machine based on our balance strategy. Due to this balance strategy, the run order of the spec files is not guaranteed when parallelized.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯将根据我们的余额策略将每个规格文件分配给可用的计算机。由于这种平衡策略，并行化时不能保证规格文件的运行顺序。

trans-unit.source: Cypress will automatically wait for elements to pass their default assertions. Just like with explicit assertions you’ve added, all of these assertions share the same timeout values.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯将自动等待元素传递其默认断言。就像您添加的显式断言一样，所有这些断言共享相同的超时值。

trans-unit.source: Cypress will automatically apply the right authorization headers if you’re attempting to visit an application that requires Basic Authentication.
trans-unit.target: 如果您尝试访问需要基本身份验证的应用程序，赛普拉斯将自动应用正确的授权标头。

trans-unit.source: Cypress will automatically apply the server and routes to the very next cy.visit() and does so immediately before any of your application code runs.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯将自动应用服务器并将其路由到下一个 cy.visit() ，并在运行任何应用程序代码之前立即执行该操作。

trans-unit.source: Cypress will automatically attach this header at the network proxy level, outside of the browser. Therefore you will not see this header in the Dev Tools.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯将在浏览器之外的网络代理级别自动附加此标头。因此，您不会在开发工具中看到此标头。

trans-unit.source: Cypress will automatically attempt to serve your files if you don’t provide a host. The path should be relative to your project’s root folder (where cypress.json is located).
trans-unit.target: 如果您不提供主机，赛普拉斯将自动尝试为您的文件提供服务。该路径应相对于项目的根文件夹（ cypress.json 所在的位置）。

trans-unit.source: Cypress will automatically balance your spec files across the available machines in your CI provider. Cypress calculates which spec file to run based on the data collected from previous runs. This ensures that your spec files run as fast as possible, with no need for manual configuration.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯将自动平衡你的规格文件在你的CI提供商的可用机器上的运行。赛普拉斯会根据从以前的运行中收集到的数据计算出要运行的规范文件。这确保了你的规范文件尽可能快地运行,而不需要手动配置。

trans-unit.source: Cypress will automatically calculate a unique selector to use targeted element by running through a series of selector strategies.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯将通过一系列选择器策略自动计算唯一选择器以使用目标元素。

trans-unit.source: Cypress will automatically clear all cookies before each test run.
trans-unit.target: 每次运行测试之前，赛普拉斯都会自动清除所有cookie 。

trans-unit.source: Cypress will automatically detect the type of browser supplied and launch it for you.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯将自动检测所提供的浏览器类型,并为您启动它。

trans-unit.source: Cypress will automatically determine if an element is animating and wait until it stops.
trans-unit.target: Cypress会自动判断一个元素是否在动画中,并等待它停止。

trans-unit.source: Cypress will continuously attempt to interact with the element until it eventually times out. If you’d like to force Cypress to interact with the element there are a few options:
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯将不断尝试与该元素进行交互，直到最终超时。如果您想强迫赛普拉斯与该元素交互，则有以下几种选择：

trans-unit.source: Cypress will create a screenshotsFolder and a videosFolder to store the screenshots and videos taken during the testing of your application. Many users will opt to add these folders to their .gitignore file. Additionally, if you are storing sensitive environment variables in your cypress.json or cypress.env.json, these should also be ignored when you check into source control.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯将创建一个 screenshotsFolder 和一个 videosFolder 以存储在应用程序测试期间拍摄的截图和视频。许多用户会选择将这些文件夹添加到他们的 .gitignore 文件中。此外，如果要将敏感的环境变量存储在 cypress.json 或 cypress.env.json 中，则在检查源代码控制时也应将其忽略。

trans-unit.source: Cypress will error and exit with status 1 if no specs were found during cypress run. Fixes #1585.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 cypress run 期间未找到任何规格，赛普拉斯将出错并以状态1退出。修复＃1585。

trans-unit.source: Cypress will fire inputonly if typing that key modifies or changes the value of the element.
trans-unit.target: 仅当键入该键修改或更改元素的值时，赛普拉斯才会触发 input 。

trans-unit.source: Cypress will fire keypressonly if that key is supposed to actually fire keypress.
trans-unit.target: 只有当该按键实际上应该触发 keypress 时，Cypress才会触发该 keypress 。

trans-unit.source: Cypress will fire textInputonly if typing that key would have inserted an actual character.
trans-unit.target: 仅当键入该键会插入实际字符时，赛普拉斯才会触发 textInput 。

trans-unit.source: Cypress will ignore this element preference order if you pass a selector argument to .contains().
trans-unit.target: 如果将选择器参数传递给 .contains() ,则赛普拉斯将忽略此元素首选项顺序。

trans-unit.source: Cypress will immediately fail with the following test code:
trans-unit.target: Cypress会立即用以下测试代码失败。

trans-unit.source: Cypress will no longer incorrectly revert to a previous test run’s snapshot when tests are re-run.
trans-unit.target: 重新运行测试时，赛普拉斯将不再错误地还原到先前测试运行的快照。

trans-unit.source: Cypress will now display the resolved configuration values when you open a project. This tells you the source of all config values.
trans-unit.target: 现在，当您打开一个项目时，赛普拉斯将显示已解析的配置值。这告诉您所有配置值的来源。

trans-unit.source: Cypress will now automatically prompt you to add a project when using cypress run on a project that has not yet been added.
trans-unit.target: 现在，在尚未添加的项目上使用 cypress run 时，赛普拉斯会自动提示您添加项目。

trans-unit.source: Cypress will now display cypress.json parse errors when attempting to boot a project when there is a syntax error in cypress.json.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯才会显示 cypress.json 尝试引导一个项目时，有一个语法错误时解析错误 cypress.json 。

trans-unit.source: Cypress will now output its internal logger directly to the console when CYPRESS_DEBUG env var is set.
trans-unit.target: 当设置了 CYPRESS_DEBUG env var 时，赛普拉斯现在将其内部记录器直接输出到控制台。

trans-unit.source: Cypress will now scroll past multiple elements that cover up an element to be interacted with. It also now factors in elements with position: sticky. Fixes #571 and #565.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯现在将滚动显示多个元素，这些元素掩盖了要与之交互的元素。现在，它还将具有 position: sticky 元素包括在内：粘滞性。修复＃571和＃565。

trans-unit.source: Cypress will prefix the URL with the baseUrl configured in your network options if you’ve set one.
trans-unit.target: 如果已设置，则赛普拉斯将使用在网络选项中配置的 baseUrl 作为URL的前缀。

trans-unit.source: Cypress will resolve your command with whatever the final Cypress command yields.
trans-unit.target: Cypress将用最终Cypress命令产生的任何命令来解决你的命令。

trans-unit.source: Cypress will restore the viewport in the snapshot
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯将恢复快照中的视口。

trans-unit.source: Cypress will retry for up to 10 seconds to find a visible element of class mobile-nav with text containing “Home”. For more examples, read the Timeouts section in the “Introduction to Cypress” guide.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯将重试长达10秒钟，以查找包含文本“ Home”的 mobile-nav 类的可见元素。有关更多示例，请阅读“赛普拉斯简介”指南中的“ 超时”部分。

trans-unit.source: Cypress will then attempt to download a binary with this format: https://www.example.com/desktop/:version?platform=p
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯随后将尝试下载具有以下格式的二进制文件： https://www.example.com/desktop/:version?platform=p : //www.example.com/desktop/ : version?platform=p

trans-unit.source: Cypress will wait for the element to pass all of these checks for the duration of the defaultCommandTimeout (described in depth in the Default Assertions core concept guide).
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯将等待该元素在 defaultCommandTimeout 的持续时间内通过所有这些检查（在Default Assertions核心概念指南中进行了详细介绍）。

trans-unit.source: Cypress won’t be able to connect to the Dashboard Service to log in or record test runs.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯将无法连接到Dashboard Service来登录或记录测试运行。

trans-unit.source: Cypress won’t be able to load web pages besides localhost.
trans-unit.target: 除 localhost 外，赛普拉斯将无法加载网页。

trans-unit.source: Cypress won’t be able to warn you if your baseUrl isn’t available.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的 baseUrl 不可用，赛普拉斯将无法警告您。

trans-unit.source: Cypress won’t resolve your commands until all of its assertions pass.
trans-unit.target: 直到所有断言都通过，赛普拉斯才会解析您的命令。

trans-unit.source: Cypress wraps all DOM queries with robust retry-and-timeout logic that better suits how real web apps work. We trade a minor change in how we find DOM elements for a major stability upgrade to all of our tests. Banishing flake for good!
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯用强大的重试和超时逻辑包装了所有的DOM查询,这更适合真实的web应用的工作方式。我们通过对DOM元素查找方式的小幅改动,对所有测试进行了重大的稳定性升级。彻底消除flake

trans-unit.source: Cypress’ internal babel will no longer attempt to load your project’s .babelrc. This helps avoid potential version conflicts. Fixes #312.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯的内部 babel 将不再尝试加载项目的 .babelrc 。这有助于避免潜在的版本冲突。修复＃312。

trans-unit.source: Cypress’ parallelization strategy is file-based, so in order to utilize parallelization, your tests will need to be split across separate files.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯的并行化策略是基于文件的，因此为了利用并行化，您的测试将需要拆分到单独的文件中。

trans-unit.source: Cypress’s APIs are built very differently from what you’re likely used to: but these design patterns are incredibly intentional. We’ll go into more detail later in this guide.
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯的API的构建与您通常使用的API截然不同：但是这些设计模式是故意的。我们将在本指南后面详细介绍。

trans-unit.source: Cypress’s recognition of websites attempting framebusting has been updated to include framebusting code wrapped within (). #3267
trans-unit.target: 赛普拉斯对尝试进行框架爆破的网站的识别已更新，其中包括包装在 () 中的框架爆破代码。＃3267

trans-unit.source: Depending on how your application is built - it’s likely that your web application is going to be affected and controlled by the server.
trans-unit.target: 根据应用程序的构建方式，您的Web应用程序很可能会受到服务器的影响和控制。

trans-unit.source: Depending on which CI provider you use, you may need a config file. You’ll want to refer to your CI provider’s documentation to know where to add the commands to install and run Cypress. For more configuration examples check out our examples.
trans-unit.target: 根据您使用的CI提供程序，您可能需要一个配置文件。您需要参考CI提供商的文档，以了解在何处添加用于安装和运行Cypress的命令。有关更多配置示例，请查看我们的示例。

trans-unit.source: Depends
trans-unit.target: Depends

trans-unit.source: Deprecated Cypress.command, instead use Cypress.Log.command to output a Command Log. Updated scaffolding on new projects to reflect this change.
trans-unit.target: 不 Cypress.command 使用Cypress.command，而是使用 Cypress.Log.command 输出命令日志。更新了新项目的脚手架以反映此更改。

trans-unit.source: Deprecated failOnStatus property for cy.request() and renamed to failOnStatusCode. Fixes #323.
trans-unit.target: cy.request() 弃用了 failOnStatus 属性，并将其重命名为 failOnStatusCode 。修复＃323。

trans-unit.source: Deprecated all Command Options. You will see a very nice and simple error message explaining how to convert these to assertions.
trans-unit.target: 不推荐使用所有命令选项。您将看到一条非常简单的错误消息，说明如何将它们转换为断言。

trans-unit.target: 元素是否具有 disabled 属性？

trans-unit.source: Doing conditional testing adds a huge problem - that the test writer themselves are unsure what the given state will be. In those situations, the only reliable way to have accurate tests is to embed this dynamic state in a reliable and consistent way.
trans-unit.target: 做条件测试会增加一个巨大的问题--那就是测试作者自己都不确定给定的状态会是什么。在这些情况下,要想有准确的测试,唯一可靠的方法就是将这种动态状态以可靠和一致的方式嵌入。

trans-unit.source: Doing it this way can be faster, more accurate, and more scalable.
trans-unit.target: 这样做可以更快、更准确、更可扩展。

trans-unit.source: Doing so enables you to block and guard Cypress by ensuring the state of descendants matches what you expect without needing to query them individually with regular Cypress DOM commands.
trans-unit.target: 这样做可以确保后代的状态与您的期望相符，从而使您无需使用常规赛普拉斯DOM命令单独查询后代即可阻止和保护赛普拉斯。

trans-unit.source: Domain cookies are now proxied better. There’s still more work to do before they are 100% fixed but now most typical domain cookie scenarios should ‘just work’.
trans-unit.target: 现在，域cookie的代理更好。在100％固定之前，还有很多工作要做，但是现在大多数典型的域Cookie方案应该“正常工作”。

trans-unit.source: Don’t Stub Responses
trans-unit.target: 不要回应

trans-unit.source: Don’t click <a> links in your tests that navigate outside of your application. Likely this isn’t worth testing anyway. You should ask yourself: What’s the point of clicking and going to another app? Likely all you care about is that the href attribute matches what you expect. So make an assertion about that. You can see more strategies on testing anchor links in our “Tab Handling and Links” example recipe.
trans-unit.target: 不要在测试中单击 <a> 链接，这些链接将导航到应用程序之外。无论如何，这都不值得测试。您应该问自己：单击并转到另一个应用程序有什么意义？您可能只关心 href 属性是否符合您的期望。因此，对此进行断言。您可以在“标签处理和链接”示例食谱中看到更多测试锚链接的策略。

trans-unit.source: Don’t do things like:
trans-unit.target: 不要做类似的事情：

trans-unit.source: Don’t feel obligated to pick just one method. It is common to use one strategy for local development but another when running in CI.
trans-unit.target: 不要只选择一种方法。通常使用一种策略进行本地开发，而在CI中运行时使用另一种策略。

trans-unit.source: Don’t target elements based on CSS attributes such as: id, class, tag
trans-unit.target: 不要基于CSS属性来定位元素，例如： id ， class ， tag

trans-unit.source: Don’t target elements that may change their textContent
trans-unit.target: 不要定位可能会更改其 textContent 的元素

trans-unit.source: Don’t try to start a web server from cy.exec().
trans-unit.target: 不要尝试从 cy.exec() 启动Web服务器。

trans-unit.source: Don’t try to start a web server from within Cypress scripts. Read about best practices here.
trans-unit.target: 不要尝试从赛普拉斯脚本中启动Web服务器。在此处了解最佳做法。

trans-unit.source: Don’t use your UI to build up state! It’s enormously slow, cumbersome, and unnecessary.
trans-unit.target: 不要使用您的UI建立状态！它非常慢，麻烦且不必要。

trans-unit.source: Drastically improved file watching on large projects with many tests. Instead of choking the CPU at nearly 100% indefinitely we now optimally watch the current working files for changes.
trans-unit.target: 在有许多测试的大型项目中,极大地改善了文件观察。现在,我们不再无限期地以接近100%的速度扼杀CPU,而是以最佳方式观察当前工作文件的变化。

trans-unit.source: Drastically simplified the architecture required for proxying.
trans-unit.target: 大大简化了代理所需的架构。

trans-unit.target: Drone

trans-unit.target: 双指令

trans-unit.source: Due to security upgrades, adding projects in previous versions will no longer work. Upgrade and everything should be okay.
trans-unit.target: 由于安全升级,在以前的版本中添加项目将不再有效。升级后,一切都应该没问题。

trans-unit.source: Duplicate, subsequent logs in the Command Log are now collapsed and can be expanded to view all logs. Fixes #1580.
trans-unit.target: 重复的命令日志中的后续日志现在已折叠，可以展开以查看所有日志。修复＃1580。

trans-unit.source: Duration estimation is done separately for every browser the spec file was tested against. This is helpful since performance characteristics vary by browser, and therefore it is perfectly acceptable to see different duration estimates for each browser a spec file was tested against.
trans-unit.target: 对规格文件所测试的每个浏览器的持续时间估计是单独进行的。这很有帮助,因为性能特性因浏览器而异,因此完全可以接受对每个浏览器进行不同的持续时间估计。

trans-unit.source: During cypress run, windows created with window.open will no longer physically display. They are now correctly headless. Fixes #123.
trans-unit.target: 在 cypress run 期间，使用 window.open 创建的窗口将不再实际显示。他们现在正确无头了。修复＃123。

trans-unit.source: During an update Cypress will now display the updating message in the same coordinates as when the app was open by clicking the tray icon.
trans-unit.target: 在更新过程中,赛普拉斯现在将通过点击托盘图标在与应用程序打开时相同的坐标上显示更新消息。

trans-unit.source: During install of cypress, the Cypress binary is now downloaded to a global cache. This prevents multiple projects from downloading the same Cypress version. Fixes #1300.
trans-unit.target: 在安装赛普拉斯期间，赛普拉斯二进制文件现在已下载到全局缓存中。这样可以防止多个项目下载相同的赛普拉斯版本。修复＃1300。

trans-unit.source: During parallelization mode or when grouping runs, Cypress will wait for a specified amount of time before completing the test run in case any more relevant work remains. This is to compensate for various scenarios where CI machines could be backed-up in a queue.
trans-unit.target: 在并行化模式下或分组运行时,赛普拉斯将在完成测试运行前等待指定的时间,以防还有更多相关工作。这是为了补偿CI机器可能在队列中备份的各种情况。

trans-unit.source: During parallelization mode, the Cypress Dashboard Service interacts with your CI machines to orchestrate the parallelization of a test run via load-balancing of specs across available CI machines by the following process:
trans-unit.target: 在并行化模式下，赛普拉斯仪表板服务将与您的CI机器交互，以通过以下过程通过跨可用的CI机器规范的负载平衡来协调测试运行的并行化：

trans-unit.source: During the test, the cy.get('.todo-list li') command quickly found the rendered <li> item - and that item was the first and only “todo A” item. Our application was waiting 100ms before appending the second item “todo B” to the list. By the time the second item was added, Cypress had already “moved on”, working only with the first <li> element. It only searched for <label> inside the first <li> element, completely ignoring the newly created 2nd item.
trans-unit.target: 在测试过程中， cy.get('.todo-list li') 命令迅速找到了渲染的 <li> 项目-该项目是第一个也是唯一的“ todo A”项目。我们的应用程序等待了100毫秒，然后才将第二项“ todo B”添加到列表中。到添加第二个项目时，赛普拉斯已经“继续前进”，仅与第一个 <li> 元素一起使用。它仅在第一个 <li> 元素内搜索 <label> ，完全忽略了新创建的第二项。

trans-unit.source: Dynamic tests split across parallel CI nodes with Knapsack Pro Queue Mode to get faster CI builds. Note - this is 3rd party implementation, different from the Cypress Dashboard parallelization.
trans-unit.target: 动态测试通过Knapsack Pro队列模式在并行的CI节点上分离,以获得更快的CI构建。注意--这是第三方的实现,不同于Cypress Dashboard的并行化。

trans-unit.source: ESLint plugin that sets globals for writing tests in Cypress.
trans-unit.target: ESLint插件,为在Cypress中编写测试设置globals。

trans-unit.source: Each API Command documents its behavior with assertions - such as how it retries or waits for assertions to pass.
trans-unit.target: 每个API命令都用断言来记录它的行为--比如它如何重试或等待断言通过。

trans-unit.source: Each Cypress command (and chain of commands) returns immediately, having only been appended to a queue of commands to be executed at a later time.
trans-unit.target: 每一条赛普拉斯命令(和命令链)都会立即返回,只是被附加到一个命令队列中,以便在以后执行。

trans-unit.source: Each command and assertion, when hovered over, restores the Application Under Test (righthand side) to the state it was in when that command executed. This allows you to ‘time-travel’ back to previous states of your application when testing.
trans-unit.target: 悬停时，每个命令和断言都将被测应用程序（右侧）恢复到执行该命令时的状态。这使您可以在测试时“时间旅行”回到应用程序的先前状态。

trans-unit.source: Each command will automatically restore the viewport to the dimensions at the time the command was issued. In other words, scrolling over each command will restore exactly what Cypress “saw” when it issued the command.
trans-unit.target: 每个命令将在发出命令时自动将视口恢复为尺寸。换句话说，滚动每个命令将完全恢复赛普拉斯发出命令时“看到”的内容。

trans-unit.source: Each command, assertion, or error, when clicked on, displays extra information in the dev tools console. Clicking also ‘pins’ the Application Under Test (righthand side) to its previous state when the command executed.
trans-unit.target: 单击每个命令，断言或错误都会在开发工具控制台中显示其他信息。执行命令时，单击还可以将被测应用程序（右侧）“固定”到其先前的状态。

trans-unit.source: Each event documents its own argument signature. To understand how to use them, please refer to the docs for each one.
trans-unit.target: 每个事件记录其自己的参数签名。要了解如何使用它们，请参阅每个文档。

trans-unit.source: Each failed test links back to the associated failure within the Cypress Dashboard.
trans-unit.target: 每个失败的测试都会链接到Cypress Dashboard中相关的失败。

trans-unit.source: Each keypress is delayed 10ms by default in order to simulate how a very fast user types!
trans-unit.target: 每个按键默认延迟10ms,以模拟快速用户的打字方式。

trans-unit.source: Each nested command has access to the work done in previous commands. This ends up reading very nicely.
trans-unit.target: 每个嵌套的命令都可以访问之前的命令所做的工作。这样最后读起来非常好。

trans-unit.source: Each of these environments would read in the configuration at these files:
trans-unit.target: 这些环境中的每一个都会在这些文件中读取配置。

trans-unit.source: Each of these likely requires a full blown e2e test.
trans-unit.target: 每一种可能都需要全面的e2e测试。

trans-unit.source: Each status check will report the number of test failures or passes, and the associated Details link will direct you to the test run’s page within the Cypress Dashboard to help you dig deeper into the problem via error messages, stack traces, screenshots, and video recordings:
trans-unit.target: 每次状态检查都会报告测试失败或通过的次数，并且相关的详细信息链接会将您定向到Cypress仪表板内的测试运行页面，以帮助您通过错误消息，堆栈跟踪，屏幕截图和视频记录来更深入地研究问题。 ：

trans-unit.source: Each test is bound to a single origin.
trans-unit.target: 每个测试都绑定到一个单一的来源。

trans-unit.source: Each test is limited to only visiting a single superdomain.
trans-unit.target: 每次测试只限于访问一个超级域。

trans-unit.source: Each time an alias in used with a cy.wait(), Cypress will not resolve until the Nth request matching the outing alias responds. Fixes #4.
trans-unit.target: 每次将别名与 cy.wait() 一起使用时，直到与郊游别名匹配的第N个请求都响应，赛普拉斯才会解析。修复＃4。

trans-unit.source: Enabling this would mean that for every single command, it would recover from errors, but only after each applicable command timeout was reached. Since timeouts start at 4 seconds (and exceed from there), this means that it would only fail after a long, long time.
trans-unit.target: 启用这个功能意味着对于每一条命令,它都会从错误中恢复,但只有在达到每个适用的命令超时后才会恢复。由于超时从4秒开始(并从那里开始超过),这意味着只有在很长很长的时间之后才会失败。

trans-unit.target: 错误信息不再在字内中断。

trans-unit.target: 通过应用程序更新到新版本时遇到的错误/崩溃现在应该已经修复。

trans-unit.source: Errors coming from plugins now display correctly in the Test Runner. Fixes #945.
trans-unit.target: 现在，来自插件的错误会在测试运行器中正确显示。修复＃945。

trans-unit.source: Errors from your plugins will not crash Cypress.
trans-unit.target: 插件产生的错误不会使赛普拉斯崩溃。

trans-unit.target: 现在，内联显示在项目添加上读取/写入 cypress.json 的错误。

trans-unit.source: Especially useful for CI environments.
trans-unit.target: 对CI环境特别有用。

trans-unit.source: Even a single end-to-end test can cover a lot of the application code. For example, let’s run the following test that adds a few items, then marks one of them as completed.
trans-unit.target: 甚至单个端到端测试都可以覆盖很多应用程序代码。例如，让我们运行以下测试，添加一些项目，然后将其中一项标记为已完成。

trans-unit.source: Even better, we can drill down into the individual source files to see what code we missed. In our example application, the main state logic is in the src/reducers/todos.js file. Let’s see the code coverage in this file:
trans-unit.target: 更好的是，我们可以深入查看各个源文件，以查看缺少的代码。在我们的示例应用程序中，主要状态逻辑位于 src/reducers/todos.js 文件中。让我们看看此文件中的代码覆盖率：

trans-unit.source: Even if you decide to skip using a 3rd party image storage and comparison service, you can still perform visual testing. Follow the example Visual Regression testing with Cypress and cypress-image-snapshot tutorial and do it all yourself.
trans-unit.target: 即使您决定跳过使用第三方图像存储和比较服务，您仍然可以执行视觉测试。遵循有关Cypress和cypress-image-snapshot教程的示例Visual Regression测试，并自己完成所有操作。

trans-unit.source: Even if your project is JavaScript only, the JavaScript specs can know about the new command by referencing the file using the special tripple slash reference path comment.
trans-unit.target: 即使您的项目仅是JavaScript，JavaScript规范也可以通过使用特殊的三重斜杠 reference path 注释来引用文件来了解新命令。

trans-unit.source: Even more - action commands will automatically wait for their element to reach an actionable state before failing.
trans-unit.target: 甚至更多-操作命令将在失败之前自动等待其元素达到可操作状态。

trans-unit.source: Even the Initiator is included, which is a stack trace to what caused the XHR to be sent.
trans-unit.target: 甚至包括 Initiator ，这是导致XHR发送的堆栈跟踪信息。

trans-unit.source: Even then, it’s still possible a WebSocket message could come in… so 5 minutes!
trans-unit.target: 即使那样，WebSocket消息仍然有可能进来……所以5分钟！

trans-unit.source: Even then, not enough, it’s possible a setTimeout could trigger… 60 minutes.
trans-unit.target: 即使这样，还不够， setTimeout 可能会触发……60分钟。

trans-unit.source: Even though Cypress runs in the browser, it automatically makes this property available for use in your tests.
trans-unit.target: 即使Cypress在浏览器中运行,它也会自动让这个属性在你的测试中使用。

trans-unit.source: Even though the <span> is the deepest element that contains “Age”, Cypress yields <label> elements over <span>.
trans-unit.target: 尽管 <span> 是包含“年龄”最深的元件，丝柏产量 <label> 以上的元素 <span> 。

trans-unit.source: Even though the <span> is the deepest element that contains “Search”, Cypress yields <button> elements over spans.
trans-unit.target: 即使 <span> 是包含“搜索”的最深的元素，赛普拉斯也会在跨度范围内生成 <button> 元素。

trans-unit.source: Even though the <span> is the deepest element that contains “Sign Out”, Cypress yields anchor elements over spans.
trans-unit.target: 即使 <span> 是包含“ Sign Out”的最深的元素，赛普拉斯也会在跨度上生成锚定元素。

trans-unit.source: Even though the <span> is the deepest element that contains a “4”, Cypress automatically yields <button> elements over spans because of its preferred element order.
trans-unit.target: 即使 <span> 是包含“ 4”的最深元素，赛普拉斯也会根据其首选元素顺序自动生成跨度的 <button> 元素。

trans-unit.source: Even though we haven’t written any tests yet - that’s okay - let’s click on sample_spec.js and watch Cypress launch your browser.
trans-unit.target: 即使我们尚未编写任何测试-没关系-让我们单击 sample_spec.js 并观看赛普拉斯启动您的浏览器。

trans-unit.source: Even though we return a string in our test, Cypress automatically figures out that you’ve queued commands above and does not end the test until all cy commands have finished.
trans-unit.target: 即使我们在测试中返回了一个字符串，赛普拉斯也会自动确定您已在上面排队了命令，并且直到所有cy命令都完成后才结束测试。

trans-unit.source: Even when tests fail, the Promise still resolves with the test results. The Promise is only rejected if Cypress cannot run for some reason; for example if a binary has not been installed or it cannot find a module dependency. In that case, the Promise will be rejected with a detailed error.
trans-unit.target: 即使测试失败， Promise 仍然可以解决测试结果。该 Promise 如果赛普拉斯因为某些原因而运行只拒绝; 例如，如果尚未安装二进制文件或找不到模块依赖性。在这种情况下， Promise 将被拒绝，并出现详细错误。

trans-unit.source: Even without adding an assertion, we know that everything is okay! This is because many of Cypress’ commands are built to fail if they don’t find what they’re expecting to find. This is known as a Default Assertion.
trans-unit.target: 即使没有添加断言，我们也知道一切都很好！这是因为，如果Cypress的许多命令没有找到期望的内容，它们就会失败。这称为默认断言。

trans-unit.source: Events that should not fire on non input types such as elements with tabindex do not fire their textInput or input events. Only typing into elements which cause the actual value or text to change will fire those events.
trans-unit.target: 不应在非输入类型上触发的事件（例如具有 tabindex 的元素）不会触发其 textInput 或 input 事件。只有键入会导致实际值或文本更改的元素，才会触发这些事件。

trans-unit.source: Events that were defaultPrevented may prevent other events from firing and those will show up as empty. For instance, canceling keydown will not fire keypress or textInput or input, but will fire keyup (which matches the spec).
trans-unit.target: 事件是 defaultPrevented 可以防止烧等事件以及那些将显示为空。例如，取消 keydown 不会触发 keypress 或 textInput 或 input ，但是会触发 keyup （与规范匹配）。

trans-unit.source: Every custom command you write is generally an abstraction over a series of internal commands. That means you and your team members exert much more mental effort to understand what your custom command does.
trans-unit.target: 你写的每一条自定义命令一般都是对一系列内部命令的抽象。这意味着你和你的团队成员要花费更多的心力去理解你的自定义命令的作用。

trans-unit.source: Every source file but 1 is covered at 100%. We can have great confidence in our application, and safely refactor the code knowing that we have a robust set of end-to-end tests.
trans-unit.target: 除1个源文件外,其他每个源文件都100%覆盖。我们可以对我们的应用程序有很大的信心,并安全地重构代码,因为我们知道我们有一套强大的端到端测试。

trans-unit.source: Every test you write will include selectors for elements. To save yourself a lot of headaches, you should write selectors that are resilient to changes.
trans-unit.target: 你写的每一个测试都会包含元素的选择器。为了让自己省去很多麻烦,你应该写出对变化有弹性的选择器。

trans-unit.source: Every time your tests run, you’d have to work out the complexity around starting an already running web server.
trans-unit.target: 每次运行测试时，都必须计算启动已经运行的Web服务器的复杂性。

trans-unit.source: Extensive memory profiling has been done and Cypress has implemented several strategies for aggressively causing garbage collection. The ebugging tools (which allow you to walk back in time through DOM snapshots, or access objects from previous tests) could exhaust all available emory in previous versions. This likely never affected most users, but if a user ran 1000’s of tests (which have been written in Cypress) it ould bomb. Now Cypress only stores data for up to 50 tests, and will begin purging data past that. When run in the terminal, Cypress doesn’t apply any of its debugging tools, so CI will be unaffected.
trans-unit.target: 广泛的内存配置已经完成，赛普拉斯已经实施了多种策略来积极引起垃圾回收。调试工具（允许您及时查看DOM快照或访问以前测试的对象）可能会耗尽以前版本中的所有可用emory。这可能永远不会影响大多数用户，但是如果用户运行了1000项测试（已用赛普拉斯编写），则该炸弹会炸弹。现在，赛普拉斯最多只能存储50个测试的数据，并将开始清除超过该数据的数据。当在终端中运行时，赛普拉斯不会应用任何调试工具，因此CI将不受影响。
